editionStmt.edition: Digital edition according to TEI P5

div.p: Illustrated are only MSS Vatican, BAV, Urb. lat. 1358 and Madrid, BN, 19. In MSS Palermo, Biblioteca Comunale, 2 Qq. E. 11 and Vatican, BAV, Reg. lat. 1801 there are blank places left for the illustrations.

listBibl.bibl: Dell’Era, Antonio. Una miscellanea astronomica medievale: gli Scholia Strozziana a Germanico. Atti della Accademia Nazionale dei Lincei : memorie ; ser. 8/Classe di Scienze morali, storiche e filologiche. Rome, 1979.
Germanicus. ‘Scholia Strozziana et Sangermanensia’. In Germanici Caesaris Aratea cum scholiis, edited by Alfred Breysig, Reprograf. Berlin, 1867 (reprint Hildesheim: Olms, 1967), 105–232.
Meyvaert, Paul. ‘Translator’s Appendix: Gregory the Great and Astronomy’. In Gregory the Great: A Symposium, edited by John C. Cavadini, 137–45. Notre Dame, IN: University of Notre Dame Press, 1995.

list.item: Florence, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana, Strozzianus 46 (s. XV, fols. 12v-62r)
London, British Library, Arundel Ms 268 (s. XIII-XIV, fols. 85r-92r) online

item.ref: Madrid, Biblioteca national, Ms 19 (s. XII, fols. 54r-74v)

list.item: Palermo, Biblioteca Comunale, 2 Qq. E. 11 (s. XV, fols. 3r-49v)
Vatican, Biblioteca apostolica vaticana, Urb. lat. 1358 (s. XV, fols. 2v-47v)
Vatican, Biblioteca apostolica vaticana, Reg. lat. 1801 (s. XV, fols. 1v-47r)
Vienna, Schottenkloster, Stiftsbibliothek, Cod. Scotensis 521 (s. XV)
